title: Enchanting Kusuma Haaram with Lavender and Rose Accents
materials: and Rose Quartz. Features Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster.
features: Inspired by the traditional Gutta Pusalu (pearl cluster) Haaram, this piece showcases a contemporary interpretation. Floral motifs encrusted with diamonds surround the captivating Lavender Chalcedony and Rose Quartz stones. Delicate diamond-studded paisley (manga malai) patterns add a touch of traditional Telugu artistry. Features a modern chain design
colors: Rose gold provides a warm backdrop
complemented by the pastel hues of Lavender Chalcedony and Rose Quartz. Dazzling white diamonds enhance the color palette with their brilliance.
occasions: Ideal for special occasions like weddings (Vadhuvu Alankarana)
or a sophisticated gala. The necklace's unique blend of traditional and modern design makes it suitable for both sarees and contemporary evening wear.
description: This exquisite necklace is a harmonious blend of tradition and modernity. The use of high-quality gemstones and expert craftsmanship ensures both durability and lasting beauty. A statement piece that embodies elegance and sophistication. It is designed and crafted right here in Hyderabad and uses only the finest materials.
